owlSpeak.engine

Class ProbModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • owlSpeak.engine.ProbModel

  • public class ProbModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that maintains all the probabilities required for updating the belief states of a Slot.
    Author:
    Savina Koleva.

    • Method Detail

      • calcUserGoalProb

        public double[][] calcUserGoalProb(java.util.Vector<Semantic> user_goal,
                          java.util.Vector<Semantic> user_goal_new)
        A function for calculating the user goal probabilities. They indicate how the user goal changes in the course of the dialogue.
        Parameters:
        user_goal - a vector of Semantics representing the current user goal values
        user_goal_new - a vector of Semantics representing the next user goal values
        Returns:
        a double array of user goal probabilities

      • calcUserActionProb

        public double[][] calcUserActionProb(java.util.Vector<Semantic> user_goal,
                            java.util.Vector<Semantic> user_actions)
        A function for calculating the user action probabilities. They signify which actions the user is likely to take.
        Parameters:
        user_goal - a vector of Semantics representing the current user goal values
        user_actions - a vector of Semantics representing the current user action values
        Returns:
        a double array of user action probabilities

      • calcObservationProb

        public double[] calcObservationProb(java.util.Vector<Semantic> observation,
                           java.util.Vector<Semantic> user_action,
                           java.lang.String[] Confidences)
        A function for calculating the observation probabilities They rely on the stored as N-best list multiple recognition results and the corresponding confidence scores.
        Parameters:
        observation - a vector of Semantics recognized as a probable user inputs
        user_action - a vector of Semantics representing the current user action values
        Confidences - a String array containing the confidence scores delivered by the recognizer
        Returns:
        an array of observation probabilities

      • calcBelief

        public double[] calcBelief(java.util.Vector<Semantic> user_goal)
        A function for calculating the initial belief states Initially the belief states are defined as 1/|the length of the user goal values|.
        Parameters:
        user_goal - a vector of Semantics representing the current user goal values
        Returns:
        an array of the initial belief states
